encyclopedia_description.last_approved_text: The Tournament Grounds can be constructed in Couronne by all nations of men to provide greater stability in the province, while also increasing the rank of all cavalry unit recruits.

encyclopedia_description.last_approved_text: This chain can be constructed in Drakenhof to enable the Von Carsteins to recruit a greater number of Vampires, and reduces the cost of their recruitment.
